body_html: @alshedivat to see how to add tests, search tests/test_distributions.py for LogNormal and StickBreakingTransform and add entries for LogitNormal and InvertibleBoltzmannTransform. To see how to add docs, search docs/source/distributions.rst for LogNormal (I believe the transform will be registered in docs automatically).

body: @alshedivat to see how to add tests, search tests/test_distributions.py for `LogNormal` and `StickBreakingTransform` and add entries for `LogitNormal` and `InvertibleBoltzmannTransform`. To see how to add docs, search docs/source/distributions.rst for `LogNormal` (I believe the transform will be registered in docs automatically).
